title: How To Break Into Male God’s Computer - Novel Updates
tags: College/University   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Secret Crush
author: Fireworks Are Not Flowers   烟花不是花
description:
Li Chenan who had just began college military training has a secret that nobody knows. After she falls asleep every night, she will transmigrate into another identity in front of her military instructor and senior classmates, becoming an ordinary object of the entire’s school girl population’s Male God YanLin. 

The first month: Help! I’ve transmigrated into my Male God’s computer!

Eh? This folder is … … … too shameful.

Eh? Male God plays this game and goes on this website everyday?

Eh? The exalted and cold Male God has quite a poisonous tongue.

Li Chenan proudly said: “Yan Lin, I know you better than you know yourself, so you can’t escape from me.”

Yan Lin: “Oh really? Read my mind then.”

A story of a little miss who continuously transmigrates near her Male God, this is also a Male God’s heartwarming story that appeared without a notice.>
